text: Eschmeyer nexus, the cofish, is a species of ray-finned fish in the order Scorpaeniformes, which is known from the Pacific Ocean, near Fiji. It is the sole species in the genus Eschmeyer in the family Eschmeyeridae. == Related pages == * Scorpaeniformes * Synanceia == References == # Froese, Rainer; Pauly, Daniel (eds.) (2022). "Eschmeyer nexus" in FishBase. February 2022 version. Category:Scorpaeniformes
title: Eschmeyer nexus
